opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: HARTFORD FIRE INSURANCE COMPANY v. Reynolds

opinion:
127 S.Ct. 2126 (2007)

HARTFORD FIRE INSURANCE COMPANY,
v.
Jason Ray REYNOLDS.

Supreme Court of United States.

April 26, 2007.

The petition for a writ of certiorari in the above-entitled case was dismissed today pursuant to Rule 46 of the Rules of this Court.
